name: nor-router.js
description: Router.js NPM wrapper for easier use with browserify

scripts.install: npm run install-router && npm run install-rsvp && npm run install-route-recognizer
scripts.install-router: cd node_modules/router && npm install -d && npm run prepublish
scripts.install-rsvp: cd node_modules/rsvp && npm install -d && npm run prepublish
scripts.install-route-recognizer: cd node_modules/route-recognizer && npm install -d && npm run prepublish

author: Jaakko-Heikki Heusala <jheusala@iki.fi>
